attributes.action: Scrap the road tax exemption on classic cars which pollute the environment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Classic cars emit more pollution than modern day 4x4's with none of the benefits (safety etc). 4x4 owners are being penalised while classic car owners are rewarded yet both pollute the environment unneccessarily. Sign below to remove the annual road tax exemption. These cars are not art!
